channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- ThinkServer BMC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- ThinkServer BMC

item.title: CVE-2018-9086|2024-08-05T07:17:51.040Z -- lenovo -- thinkserver%20bmc
item.description: In some Lenovo ThinkServer-branded servers, a command injection vulnerability exists in the BMC firmware download command. This allows a privileged user to download and execute arbitrary code inside the BMC. This can only be exploited by authorized privileged users.
